Message:
When the carriage carrying Priscilla
vanished into the distance,
someone spoke.

“...We will return our witch
to where she belongs.
You are not needed.”

Ahh... From the very beginning,
these men never intended to
keep their promise.

Am I going to die here,
unable to protect her...?

Before I knew it,
the rage...and the shame from
not being able to keep my promise
had granted me magical power.

One of the men noticed
my transformation,
but he was too late.

I won’t let you
get away with this...

I will defeat every
last one of you...!
